#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int factorial(int n)
{
  int c,fact = 1;
  for (c = 1; c <= n; c++)
    fact = fact * c;

  return fact ;
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int i,a[11],k,fre[11],anew[11],j,s,ctr,counter=0;
		for(i=0;i<11;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&a[i]);
		}
		scanf("%d",&k);
		sort(a,a+11);
		s=0;
		for(i=0;i<11;i+=ctr)
		{	
			ctr=1;
			for(j=i+1;j<11;j++)
			{
				if(a[i]==a[j])
				{
					ctr++;
				}
				else
				break;			
			}
			fre[s]=ctr;
			anew[s]=a[i];
			//printf("%d %d\n",anew[s],fre[s]);
			s++;
			counter++;
			
		}
		
		int sum=0,d,x;
		while(sum<k)
		{
			sum+=fre[counter-1];
			counter--;
		}
		x=fre[counter];
		if(sum==k)
		printf("1\n");
		else
		{
			d=x-(sum-k);
			printf("%d\n",factorial(x)/(factorial(x-d)*factorial(d)));
		}			
	}
	return 0;
}
